name: Tiger
description: The tiger is the largest species among the Felidae and classified in the genus Panthera.

name: Asian Elephant
description: The Asian elephant is the largest living land animal in Asia and is known for its intelligence and strong social bonds.

name: Domestic Cat
description: The domestic cat is a small, typically furry, carnivorous mammal. They are often called house cats when kept as indoor pets.

name: Bornean Orangutan
description: The Bornean orangutan is a species of orangutan native to the island of Borneo. They are known for their intelligence and arboreal lifestyle.

name: Gray Wolf
description: The gray wolf is a large canine native to Eurasia and North America. It is known for its complex social structure and pack behavior.

name: Giraffe
description: The giraffe is the tallest living terrestrial animal and the largest ruminant. They are known for their long necks and distinctive coat patterns.

name: Brown Bear
description: The brown bear is a large bear species found across Eurasia and North America. They are omnivorous and have a varied diet.

name: Lion
description: The lion is a species in the family Felidae and a member of the genus Panthera. They are known for their strength and social behavior.

name: Plains Zebra
description: The plains zebra is the most common and geographically widespread species of zebra. They are known for their distinctive black-and-white striped coats.

name: Red Panda
description: The red panda is a small mammal native to the eastern Himalayas and southwestern China. They are known for their reddish-brown fur and bushy tails.

name: Human
description: Humans are a species of primate known for their advanced cognitive abilities, use of language, and creation of complex societies.
